content.detailedDescription: I saw a giant green light fly across the sky and it was gone and no ware to be found a second later.
content.summary: A big green light flew across the sky and disapeared 1 second later

content.detailedDescription: While walking home. from ridge rd, and colfax, to get smokes. when i almost got to end of rallison almost to elm st. (49th) i seen a white dog out side. he was big so i watched him a i walked passed. no steet lights so it was dark. and my feet were killing me. night air was hott. by time i was heading back i was tired. but as  i passed this dog i seen a odd bright star i thought. didnt pay it much because i was just wanting to get home. and was sore. but i looked at it again. and didn't pay it mind and for some reason i stopped. and gave it a look. i seen the tree line and watched this star to see if it moved against the tree line and as i watched it moved about 6 feet across the sky. and stopped at this time i was like with is that!!! and watched it sit there and 3 other little points of light came down. (the sky was clear and many stars were out) but these came right to the star bright light that moved. once there the bigger one the star moved yet again to wrere it was the 1st time i seen it sitting. then the 3 followed it. they sat for bout 60 seconds. then the big star like light did a loop as big as a quarter. then sat for 10 seconds then all 4 went up into the sky. and kinda faded out. there was many stars in the sky this wasn't a starlight or a balloon. or a bird or venus. just a week before this me and my friend seen a black craft poping in and out of a cloud. over paylow food store on ridge rd, in griffith in day light while going to car, and now i seen this. i have no clue what i seen.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Walking home

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside at 10:30pm to let my dog out and looked up in the sky and noticed 5 white circles darting across the sky in different directions and then coming together in a formation, interacting, twirling around and then they dispersed and all went in different directions very rapidly...In a split second.  there were no surface to air rays that would be visible if these were spot lights.

i was watching them do this for about 15 minutes and then went inside to get my adult daughter to see if she could see what i was seeing.  and she did. she went inside to get my digital camera and was snapping pictures of the objects.  my daughter then went inside for a few minutes and handed me the camera.  while my daughter was gone, i looked over the pictures she took but didn't see anything in them so i deleted them. 

she came back out and we were watching them for another 10-15 minutes repeatedly doing the above.  their position started moving westerly so they were almost directly over our house.  my daughter went back inside and i stayed outside and continued snapping pictures for another 20 minutes or so.  i then went inside for the night about midnight but they were still in the sky when i went in.

after looking at the pictures i noticed an object that i hadn't seen in the sky.  it was a solid circular object with a white glow around it.  it wasn't the moon because the sky was cloudy and no moon was visible.  there were 3 pictures that were all taken at the same time (11:54pm) split seconds apart.  the 1st picture showed a solid white circular object with a glowing white ring around it.  the 2nd picture showed nothing and the 3rd pictures showed the same solid circular object with the same glowing white ring around it but it was 3 times larger and in a different spot.  keep in mind these 3 pics were all taken in the same second...11:54pm.  

the next day, we uploaded the pictures to my daughter's computer and noticed faint circular objects in the sky that were not visible from the camera's view finder.  my daughter put red circles around the objects so they were more easily seen.

we live near chicago executive airport, so i called them a few days later, described the incident to them and they requested that we email them the photos.  we did and they gave us the standard "we'll get back to you" but haven't.

we know what we saw was not spotlights but have no idea what it actually was.  the pictures are still on the digital camera as proof that we haven't  manipulated or tampered with them.  everyone we've showed the pictures to is stunned by them and have no explanation as to what they could be.  so we're like your expert opinion on what they are or might be.
content.summary: 5 objects darting in different direction then coming together in a formation, interacting and then darting apart again.  repeat over and over.

content.detailedDescription: Around 11:40pm i was getting out of my car when i looked up and saw an orb, blue in color with a slight white hue. the object came from a nne direction and i assumed it was a helicopter, but i noticed it had no strobes, made no sound, and it was the strangest color blue i've ever seen. all at once it flickered and changed direction and appeared to be flying straight up towards the stars, and since it was a nice clear night i was able to watch the object fade as if it were leaving the atmosphere, and within 15 seconds of the directional change it was gone. after the sighting i was in awe and disbelief, until i called my mother in the morning and she started telling me about a seeing a big blue star above her house that flashed and disappeared. oddly enough her sighting was around 10:45pm, and she lives 5 miles and to the north of my sighting.
content.summary: Orb was flying at a moderate speed in horizontal path then changed direction flew straight up and appeared to fade out within 15 seconds.

content.detailedDescription: Myself and another person were watching some planes with binoculars and noticed a pill shaped object with no wings flying about the same speed as the jets but about half as high.We watched as the object was flying south and veered to southwest and continued out of sight.I watched closely as it veered to try to see any wings and still didn't see any.It happened june 13 2012 at 7:15 pm on a clear day with little to no clouds.
content.summary: Wingless bright white body with black stripe around middle

content.detailedDescription:
This happened a long time ago. i never reported it officially before but wanted to before i get too old or aren't around anymore. the time was a weekday night 1st/ 2nd week august 1969, the place, the extreme nw suburban corner of detroit mi. i was 8. it was the summer before i started 3rd grade.  
i woke 3-5am to find my room lit by a soft glow. the window shades were drawn as usual, the room should have been quite dark there being only a small night light. the light was coming around the borders of the shade from the room's larger window that faced due west and looked out over our backyard. upon lifting the shade and looking out i saw the 'object'.
it was intensely lighted with bright white light all over it. it's outlines could not be exactly made out due to the intense light against the black sky but it seemed to be round perhaps hexagonal. it was close, about 80 ft. from me, about 50-90 ft. off the ground and about 20 ft. in diameter. *when i was 8 at the time i didn't know how to calculate such distance/size, but we lived in the same house a long time and i had the same room, so as i got older it was easy for me to reconstruct it's size, distance, height from the same tree line, phone poles and place in the sky where i saw it from that same window (in fact the experience made me a life long careful observer always noting time/ distance/ size etc.)
it was hovering and unmoving. as i looked studying it i noticed that it did not hurt your eyes despite the intense light and that there were pink hues mixed in with the white. the most notable feature beside the overall bright white light was 3 large round lights in the primary colors equally spaced in a horizontal row in what seemed to be the objects middle. i know there was red and blue and i think yellow. these lights blinked fairly slowly on and off individually. each of these lights was one of the 3 colors but not always the same color (for example the one that had been red, when it blinked back on might be blue, and the one that had been blue then blink on red). as a little kid i thought it the most amazing thing and fun to watch. there was also a barely noticeable narrow band of rotating lights in sequence, near the objects presumed bottom. these were white lights followed by dark gaps. 
the object made no sound i heard.
as an 8 year old i was thrilled and excited and knew it 'must' be a 'spaceship' and since it didn't seem to be going anywhere (at this time i'd calculate later i'd been watching it 4-5 minutes) that it must be 'landing' and in 'my' backyard! this made me even more thrilled and excited (little kid logic). the thing was...What to do?
being out of bed so late (i'd never been out of bed that late before) was a really major offence in our house, and if i woke my parents and by the time they looked, it was gone, i'd really get killed. sneaking all through the house unlocking the doors and going out in the backyard by myself was out of the question. i thought of telling my sister and went to her but she was fast asleep and was always 'stealing' my stuff anyway, and this was 'my' discovery. so, with little kid logic i determined that the only thing to do was wait till daylight which i knew couldn't be too far off. 
i went back to bed and tried to wait, i kept opening my eyes to check if the object was still there (from the glow in the room), it was. finally i forced myself to keep my eyes closed and not look anymore to make the waiting easier. the whole experience had probably been about 10 minutes. eventually i feel asleep.
in the morning of course, there was no 'spaceship', no one else had seen/ heard anything and had all been asleep, as i knew, and no one believed me! i scoured the backyard for 'signs' of my 'discovery' and of course as an 8 year old found nothing. i told all my kid friends all that summers day and by evening they were making a joke of it. my parents got sick of the story. my mom tried to convince me it was a dream or 'something i ate' and i called my parents 'stupid' and slammed my door on them which got me a whack from my dad.
a couple of months later in oct. 1969 then in 3rd grade we were to write about something exciting that happened to us over the summer and i wrote all about what i'd seen that night and drew a picture. the teacher said it was a good story but we were supposed to right about something 'real'. i talked back to her and said it 'was' real and she told my mom i had 'quite the imagination'.
i always saved that 3rd grade paper because it was the only 'proof' i had that it happened at all.
content.summary: Long ago bright white lighted object with row of 3 round color lights middle hovering over our yard 80' away tree top level.

content.detailedDescription: Well i heard a few very loud  sounds of jets going by, the second time they went by, it sounded like one had shot a missile. it was so loud i thought our house was going to be struck by an aircraft. i heard them coming back and went outside to see what their doing. when i looked to to see the jets, i noticed a black spec hovering in one spot of the sky about a mile away. two military jets were on their flight path in line to collide with the object. they flew directly through where the black spec was, and it vanished. i didn't see anything go any directions other then the two military jets never returning. my neighbor down the street said he saw the jets encircling the area and he too had heard a weird missile launching-like sound.
content.summary: Stationary black spec hovering above eugene

content.detailedDescription: The sky was clear and dark. all the stars shone bright. the transit on venus just a few weeks away, and solar and lunar eclipses imminent. a single giant cloud formed out of no where beyond a neighbors house and the blinking lights that made no sound began to emerge one by one, as if playing with each-other. i called them in closer by repeating my thoughts. first, one craft began to glide steadily toward my house, as if it and the others are lookout for something even more spectacular. others move in a steady line over my home but i keep my camera on the closest one. they look like the shape of a giant sweet pea pod but black, with only one big pea in the center and the barren tips curve like wings. they and moved so randomly, blinking across the sky, back and forth, with one another and now they all focus and scan the area, in silence. the triangle formation of lights on each can be seen when they are just above and the three white lights blink in unison. as the closest of the pods passes over my house my eyes see a craft like i have never seen on t.V. or in movies or even on the internet. it pops up from behind my house, from down within the trees and moves toward me with great ease and purpose. the craft is in the shape of a crystal but made of metal and covered, seemingly randomly in yellow-orange lights. some of the lights project a constant dull glow while others blink one by one. it was as large as a s.U.V, turned on it's end. it was conical in shape, pointed on top and bottom, and the many slivers of metal fit together in a very abstract way. it was in no way symmetrical or smooth. it glided so smoothly and dropped down less than a hundred feet from me, just over my rooftop. it proceeded to rise up just above the treetops and beyond them, toward the cloud formation that still lights up fiercely, every minute or so, like bright lightning but with absolutely no sound. the only sound was a soft hum as the metallic, crystal craft ascended upon me from the heavens. my soul, heart and mind were wide open with anticipation and lookout crafts remained circling my house for at least an hour, blinking and moving randomly and they in straight line patterns, in and out of the cloud mist.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Closest viewing of alien vehicle so far

content.detailedDescription: We were in a boat fishing in the gulf near dauphin island and a giant bright glowing orange orb appeared for about 3 minutes then disappeared. about 2 minutes later several smaller orange orbs appeared all over the sky and some split into 2 or more different orbs. this went on for 35 to 45 minuted then the coast guard helicopters flew over hear at high rate of speed going in the orb;s direction with their spot lights on. about 2 minutes 2 navy fighter with after burners on passed over head at a very high rate of speed moving to the direction of the orbs.... then they disappeared.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Multiple glowing orange orbs over the gulf near dauphin island

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from a friends poker game on the west end of panama city beach florida. i live on east end of beach, i left her house at approximately 11:00 pm. i was driving home along back beach road and was very close to home. all along the road are large telephone/ cable towers. i first noticed the three very bright lights that were connected and thought it must be a new/ different type of tower, or a plane. the towers blink at intervals so usually when it blinks again you can see more. i was waiting for that to happen....When i waited i noticed the three lights i was watching went away.I did not actually see them move away, they were just gone after i looked away.  because i was driving i had to keep my eyes on road so i did look away for a decent period of time. i figured the tower was probably just behind cloud cover, which was moderate. a tower blinked in the distance and i could clearly notice it was in some clouds so i knew that wasnt it. the tower was defintiely just  a single light. only a few seconds later i noticed the three light object again not under cloud cover. it appeared to be hovering, so i did try to keep track of it out the window of vehicle. we have military bases and an airport  so i was not really alarmed just seemed odd that it was so still. then i realized  it was also quiet. i turned everything off in the car, except the car itself. it was in same place, as i turned right onto alison avenue it was the closest it would be to me during my drive home. as i traveled down alison avenue it was to my left.  it was still motionless and definitely silent. i lost sight of it again as i stopped at red light and turned onto front beach road, i never spotted it again 
it was definitely three different very bright lights that appeared attached to each other, the middle one was red, the outer ones were yellow. they appeared extrodinarily bright and seemed as big as an aircraft. i was tempted to pull over on alison but i was a little frightened. as i got into my neighborhood  i briefly stopped by the front door and looked up to look to spot it again but saw nothing, and was not going to keep looking cause i was creeped out. i have no idea what it was, but it seemed weird to me. i have told no one not even my husband. i definitely believe in the possibility of the phenomenon and life elsewhere, so coming from me they would just think i was telling a tall tale. not to mention i have no idea that is actually what it was.
content.summary: Three lights in a row appeared connected hovering silently over area

content.detailedDescription: In november (i don't remember exactly what day it was) 1992, i was traveling home on what is now i-99, heading wsw around 10:30 p.M. the sky had minimal cloud coverage and was moonlit providing fairly unobstructed visibility.  i could see the red warning lights atop the three radio towers near the barons on the horizon and while looking at them, noticed something green and what appeared to be the same size and height of the radio tower lights.  my initial reaction was that one of the light's shell must have shattered and the light was arcing.  as i continued i began to notice the object was appearing larger to me and realized that it was traveling toward me, maintaining it's altitude, which i guessed as approximately 500 - 1000 feet.  as it got closer to me i pulled off the highway and parked, turned my engine off and rolled my driver window down.  i could clearly see the object was emerald green in color with gold sparks emanating from all around the sphere.  because of the proximity of the local airport, the characteristics of the object and it's apparent flight path, i thought i was witnessing a small aircraft that was on fire trying to make it to the airport to land.  there was absolutely no sound from the object.  i watched the object maintain it's flight path to the eastern horizon, never changing altitude and eventually flying out of sight.  i estimate the speed of the object approximately 125-175 knots.  my evolving interest in air phenomena motivated me to finally share this observation publicly.
content.summary: Green fireball traveling from sw to ne parallel to the ground on a moonlit evening with sparse cloud cover

content.detailedDescription: Walking my dog looked up seen two star like objects streaking back and forth changing directions unlike any man made aircraft ive ever seen. it was amazing!
content.summary: Star like

content.detailedDescription: Walking my dog looked up seen two star like objects streaking back and forth changing directions unlike any man made aircraft ive ever seen. it was amazing!
content.summary: Star like

content.detailedDescription:
Looking west, a small asprin sized red light came from the southwest,right above the treeline ,but on the horizon, and was travelling north at a steady climb, shortly, a second light appeared directly behind it, and flew identicle paths together..A slow climb untill i lost sight of them behind a cloud. the whole incident lasted just over a minute. the lights had the characteristics of an aircraft, no crazy speeds or manuevers. almost looked like two military jets on an afterburner climbing out, but just looked weird because they didn't change in intensity as veiwing angle changed, and i didn't hear a thing..Expected at least a little rumble as it was very quiet, and very little wind.
  at first i thought it was a police helicopter, but then realized, here, the copters have flashing blue and red lights, and usually a spot light shining down when they're flying at low altitude
  sure wish i had got my camera out, but had outside flood lights on, and honestly, was waiting to hear a sound, before i knew it, they were gone behind the cloud.
content.summary: 2  red lights in the sky over stuart florida

content.detailedDescription: I & my brother had arrived in the riverdale wynn dixie parking lot & i spotted a very large cone shaped trail or cone of light looking like it started on the east coast & continued across the sky into the clouds in the west. it had dark streaks beside each light edge delineated by another looks like residual light beams outside the cone. we took pics & a short movie of this incident. i know this was not light coming through the clouds due to the fact the sun was almost down & behind the stormclouds. to my knowledge light doesn't come from diffuse & focus to a point across the state. homestead is approx. where it terminated or originated.There is a large gridpoint there as coral castle is located there for a purpose only ed leedscalnin know. anyway i have seen other strange occurances here & this is the latest thanks for reading.
content.summary: Giant cone of light similar to jet wash but all the way across the sky

content.detailedDescription: While heading to car, noticed these lights in the distance, playing a sort or tag, hovering near eachother, then speeding away.  getting close then again speeding from eachother.  went and got a friend to see what i was, and then went and got two more friends.  all of us witnessed the lights speeding towards, then away from eachother at high speeds, and changing directions without stopoping or slowing down.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two to three lights diving and ascending into the air around eachother at breakneck speeds.

content.detailedDescription:
Date: 2008-12-24

time: 22:46:00

weather: nightime, very clear sky, no wind, quiet

duration: lasted about 15 seconds

country: australia

orientation: inside bedroom, spotted outside of bedroom window

number of ufos: 1

height: 100-150m

size: golf ball

number of witnesses: 2
details:
me and my sister were in my bedroom watching tv, when an advertisement came on, we were talking, the way i was facing her looked straight out my window. i saw something emitting blue light hovering around, silent, not a noise. my sister also watched. at first it was flat going slowly to the side, then it turned around and went the other way, then repeated a few times. when it turned it went on it's side, allowing me to clearly see the shape of the object, triangular, with a smaller triangle on the bottom - connected as one. it was blackish in appearance with the blue glow.
after it did the turns, it just went..Bang..Silent, but it left so fast you couldn't see it.
here's the weird thing. what this means, i don't know, maybe one of you could help me out...Within 2 minutes of seeing this, i felt light headed, and i saw a massive meteorite crashing into the earth, like it was really happening, i was 100% awake, un drugged, like a premonition kind of thing. i went out and ran to my nan.
to this day no-one believes me, even my sister says it was a plane or something? how could a plane move like that?!
that was an extract from my submitted report. please help if you can, maybe someone has something of relevance.
content.summary: Moved around in random directions slowly for around 13 seconds then shot off insnanely quick.

content.detailedDescription:
Leaving harsens island mi approx. 9:50.  stopped at end of drive to lock the gate when my boyfriend got out of the suv i looked up and saw numerous star like objects traveling in no such order but keeping in a controlled area assending into the upper atmosphere at a modest speed. they just kept coming from the east to the west until finally bringing up the end were 2 larger star like objects side by side and then they were gone.  when my boyfriend got out of the suv he too looked up to the sky as he always does. he then turned to me and shouted do you see this?  there was no one around on the road nor anywhere else we could see.  we continued on our way to the ferry.  i contacted 911 to report what we had seen and was told they had no other reports.  when we arrived at the ferry we asked the deckhand if he saw anything unusual that evening and he said no.  

my boyfriend called selfridge airbase if they were doing any maneuvers and they said no.  i told my boyfriend that it looked like an alien field trip with the mentors bringing up the rear. could they have been balloons like weather balloons?  i think not.  and could not be airplanes, too many too close to each other.

thats my story.
content.summary: Standing @ end of drive next to road & bay looked @ sky & saw 30+ star like objects assending into the western sky followed by 2 larger star like objects side by side and vanished.

content.detailedDescription: My brother and i were in southern oregon choppin wood on the back porch. we both herd a noise, like something spinning at high speed, like a jet, or a turbo but quiet like a car idling. it sounded close like right above us. we looked up and saw a disk/egg shaped silver, shinny, metallic looking object about 20ft across and 8 ft thick decend down thru the trees at about 10ft/sec from about 80ft, and come to a stop a few feet above the ground 35-45ft from us. i had no idea what i was looking at except it was right infront of us and it was really there, i could have hit it with a rock. we observed it for a few seconds, then it emitted a red beam at us. we turn and ran into the house and when i grabbed the door handle i saw our silloette on the door the circomfrence of the beam was approximately 6ft. when we got inside we were yellin for my mom to come see, and when she did it was gone. my brother and i talked about it with my mom, im not shure what she thought of it. i have told others my story and usualy most dont beleive me so i didnt tell it for most of my early to late twentys. my brother went to the airforce and was gone for about 5 years, he had background checks and such for his clearance. he came home once i asked him about it , he kinda dismissed it and wouldnt talk about it. that bothered me, so recently i asked him again and he told it back to me the way i remembered it without any leading, all his words.
content.summary: My brother and i saw a oval, disk/egg, shaped object decend and land 35-45 ft from us

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard june 13 2012 in north phoenix arizona at 9:05 pm arizona time when i was smoking a cigarette on my back porch when i looked to the south from my house and saw a bright red rose large spot of light as bright as a police helicopter spot light from about approximately 2 miles or so at a 30 to 35 degree angle hovering briefly when i first saw it and then it began moving to the se at a decent speed but not overly fast until it passed below the tree line along our back street that obscured my view of the light.  i only saw this light for about 1 to 1 1/2 minutes at the most before i could no longer see it but i did have time to grab my binoculars that i have inside my back door for watching satellites and i viewed it until i could no longer see it but it was not a helicopter or plane as i am very familiar with those lights because i live within 5-7 miles from the deer valley airport and i watch the planes all of the time when i am in my backyard smoking. i just felt that i had to post this because it was very unusual and i wanted to put it on this site before the local news came on here tonight because i'm sure others saw this with there being many small planes in the local air as well as many like myself who were on the ground that saw this thing. as far as how am i feeling at this time i would have to say a little anxiety from seeing something this odd. thanks for the space to report such things, witness in north phoenix arizona.
content.summary: In my backyard bright red rose large spot of light stationary and then moved away

content.altitude: Treetop, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: My wife has lived in the rural area of north garrard county since she was little and has always told me stories of things she and her family had seen. i came from lexington and until recently had always lived in the city where it is really hard to see anything more than street lights and traffic. after we got married and adopted our autistic son we purchased a small farm on the same ridge that she grew up on. i have always had an open mind that has always searched for answers and been filled with curiosity. not long after moving in and getting our farm established i began seeing lights in the night sky that did not fit any known aircraft i had ever read about or seen. it has become a nightly routine of laying in bed watching out the window and counting how many we see and how many can be written off as a plane or helicopter. we do live fairly close to an army depot located in richmond, but the shear number of what we see and the odd flight patterns don't seem to be "typical" aircraft. my mother who has always been very religious and a skeptic finally has began to open her mind a little with each visit she makes. i even joke with her about seeing her friends outside. i would love if anyone else close to the area could explain or confirm what i see.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Nightly occurences.

content.detailedDescription: I was out on my front porch letting my dog outside before retiring for the evening...Looking up to the sky to view the stars, which i like to do, i noticed quite a bright star (so i thought) and watched it for a few minutes, then, suddenly a smaller, less bright star-like object began following it.  at first, when i saw the brighter star-like object, i thought it was a satellite, because it was behaving in the same manner, moving slowly across the night sky.  when the smaller one began following it, changing direction around the brighter one, it also, began to change direction.  neither of them moved in a direction that could be said as normal, as the smaller one, from what i could tell, seemed like it wanted to make contact with the brighter one.  after viewing this for more than 10 minutes, i looked around the neighborhood to see if anyone was outside that i could confirm what i was seeing.  my next-door neighbor said he saw the very same thing.  i scrambled back to my front porch after getting him over to my yard and we both viewed this and saw nothing strange for the next several minutes.  i remember seeing something on tv about mufon and decided to submit this report'
content.summary: Witnessd bright star like object shortly, then dimmer star-like object hovered/chased around brighter one, then the second turned elongated with lights

content.detailedDescription:
My mother and i were watching it out the windows facing east and it was coming just over the tree tops from the west heading south-west. 

after it passed over the apartments i ran out to the front and continued to see it ascend over i-35 and into the low lying rain clouds. it was all black in the back part and looked flat there unlike the sides and cone front which were white with 7-8 glossy light navy blue window trim with the window part white too. a design in the same blue color was observed on the larger front window but i couldn't make it out. the best i remember it was a zig-zag type like a lightning bolt of some sort. 

two blinking lights one of the front and one on the back part. i remember red and green and blue lights blinking.

two long antenna one top and one bottom with blinking colored lights on the top and bottom.

there were many lights around the complex and other complexes and it helped reflect off of the craft and was very visible to see because of this fact.

i have seen blimps up close and they are real loud with their propellers and this craft made no noise at all. it did not wobble or appear to be swayed by the breeze, but make an intended straight line over the complex and i-35.

also, no undercarriage for a crew and passengers was ever noticed like a regular blimp and no rudders at the back also. 

we viewed it in the back of the building about 60-70 yards away and it was only about 40 yards off the ground and looked about 30-40 yards long. we saw it at an angle going south-west.

i have wondered why the craft had the antennas on the top and bottom and after thinking about it thought the most practical reason is that it uses them for sensors and markers since the large silver metal power lines were just feet below these antenna. my guess is they are retractable and that explains why i never saw them on any cigar shaped ufo on google image search.

i will download the picture to you tomorrow from the sketch i took just an hour after we saw this object.

yes, i have often wondered how drivers on i-35 didn't get a million dollar shot at this object, but by then it was just starting to descend into the dark rain clouds.
content.summary: I sent margiekay 2 emails last sept on the ufo...We have since moved back to texas

content.detailedDescription:
I am reporting what my grandmother told me today. i have never seen anything paranormal myself, nor has she. neither of us watch programs or read about ufos, for all i know it could have been a natural phenomenon. she is not on any medications and has no medical illnesses like dementia and she has never lied to me about anything, and swears she saw this.

she was out on the deck smoking "a couple nights ago", i assume june 10th or 11th, 2012 while i was at a friends. it was a clear, quiet night. 

she enjoys watching planes and helicopters fly overhead at night as we live somewhat near a military airport. 

she spotted three white, bright orbs high up in the sky nw of our house. she first spotted one white orb (about the size of a star, but brighter and a bit larger)slowly flying north; so she went to grab her binoculars. she came back outside and noticed two more of the orbs nw flying towards each other, but they disappeared into thin air before they hit each other. the other orb (the first one she saw) was still flying north, but it then suddenly turned 90 degrees and started flying east, then disappeared. 

the lights were not flashing or blinking like on planes, and there was no sound of the engine and no trail.

i posted that she saw something on my facebook but didn't give the details. a friend of mine (who lives about a 20 minute drive away) commented saying that her and her boyfriend saw the same thing i just described, a week or two earlier. only the three lights flew towards each other in a triangular formation then disappeared. i had not told anyone about this yet, nor had my grandmother.

i would liked to have seen this myself, but i do believe my grandmother and know that she did see what she said she saw. i would love a natural explanation because i do not want to believe in ufo's, too scary...
content.summary: Round bright white lights above eastern passage,

content.detailedDescription:
Dear friends,

 hi my name is laura, and was 18 at the time. it was midnight october 1996 to be and i was in deep shock after what i saw, i believe in god, but couldn't believe that i saw this,i wasn't alone. that night my mother told me to call my brother andrew in it was late, and he had been rebuilting an engine for several hours in the back yard. i notice some stobe lights in the sky and decided to look to see what was going on, it was a clear night. all of the sudden i was paralyzed with fear when i saw a spaceship disklike acending from the sky hovering and stopped directly above me. it was purple silverish, and spinning clockwise. i called to my brother to look but my voice was being controlled and i couldn't yell loud enough to get his attention. i kept looking up and said i must be dreaming and is this for real,this cannot be happening. all of the sudden it was closer but still far, and i could see three red lights changing colors to yellow and red in a triangle shape. they communicated with me telephathicly, telling me it was my time to be abducted. they were going to take me, but i ,strongly refuse to go. finally after 10 mins, they i knew there was more than one creature, they sent me images of them in my head. the saucer started spinning faster and they slowly moved around the sky and then in hyperspeed like starwars ships do and took off into space. then my brother looked up and it was too late. i ran to tell my mom what had happen,she said i was crazy and if i reported it i would end up in the mental institution. so i kept it to myself all these years except to my husband. 
a year ago my husband was suffering from sleep paralysis. he gets frozen and held down by creature like things in the bed. sometimes they are holding his legs and arms towards the celing. he cannot move, breathe, or call out for help. sometimes he was levitated and moved in the room. he was being dragged out the front door once and woke up in the bed screaming and believing he was awake the entire time. this would happen for a few months. he would  also wake up to sounds of explosions. one day the nosie woke me up too. i was panicing. he had a dream we were being watched by aliens, grey creatures. he still sufferes severe headaches since and me too, like we never had before. and a year ago i had a terminal illness, which is completely gone now. the sleep paralysis is gone too.
content.summary: Saucer shaped like disc hovering directly above me for 10 minutes

content.detailedDescription: Since having a sighting in my backyard over memorial day weekend, i have been watching the sky at night. i had observed the same pulsing/strobing star that floated over my neighborhood that weekend,  now in the distance on several occassions. however, last night i saw something different. i observed some flasing lights over my treeline and called my boyfriend out, who also observed them. we then lost sight of them, so i went around to the front of the house to take a look. at this lime i saw an orange ball moving through the sky. it did not blink or make a sound. i watched it come across our entire block, but then it went behind a tree and never emerged on the other side. at which time we noticed an airplane in the direction the ball had been heading. we eventually went back inside, but i kept popping back out to check the skies. at one point i saw a flashing light dancing around the pulsing star that was in the distance. i called my boyfriend back out. the single light was then joined by two more flashing lights and they danced/flashed around for a few minuted until they lined up in a straight line directly below the pulsing star. this alignment seemed to cause a reaction in the star object of a bright red strobe. the small lights then moved off in seperate directions and disappeared. the pulsing star object became more distant.
content.summary: Orange non blinking orb and seperate formation of white flashing lights w starlike object

content.detailedDescription: Was on the way to my mothers house to drop some things off when my wife noticed in the sky a huge ball of light moving toward our direction from the south west. when it got closer to us i could see that it had many different colored lights that ran around the craft. it was either triangular or the shape of a boomerang. the craft was between 500 and 1000' in the air. it came at our area from the south west and headed toward the north east. when it was over head i could hear what sounded like 5 or 6 jet engines and they made a loud roaring sound. my wife tried to grab the camera but it did not want to work. then my cb radio started going crazy getting louder as the thing went over us. the lights on our truck went dim and almost died out. when i noticed this in the air i tried to raise a friend of mine on the cb but could not get anyone.
content.summary: Pulstaing lights

content.detailedDescription: I was out on my front porch around 2:30 in the am someking a cigerette before returning to bed and i was looking up star gazeing admireing all the stars that were visible from my front porch when i noticed that 1 of these stars was moveing in a straight line heading from west to east and it had speed to it. after i lost sight of it i came back inside and went to my back porch to see if i could pick it up again and i did. it was heading in a steady direction to the east.
content.summary: Bright light

content.detailedDescription: North to south, glowing, thought it was a star untill it changed direction and disappered. while it move it would quickly zigzag like a heart monitor does. lasted about 10 min then the glowing got smaller till it was gone. their is an air force base very close by. when it was over it, the glowing got brighter.
content.summary: North to south, glowing, thought it was a star untill it changed direction and disappered

content.detailedDescription: It was june 12th 2012 around 10:45pm i was out for a walk and a smoke when i noticed that the star directly in the east sky looked to be growing in width and then began to pulsate with very noticeable lights rotating in a pattern i was in complete aww and watched its lights swirl around and around i began walking towards the east when i looked quickly around to see if any one can be a witness  and no one was around i looked i looked back at the area that the ufo was and it was gone completely vanished with absolutely nothing for it to hide behind so i was upset that i turned away and didn't get to see it leave, i looked all around and then looked straight up to ursa major and saw a tiny star looked to be out of our atmosphere traveling slowly without lights blinking it kept a continuous whitish dim light glowing traveling from above me to the north and then  2 army jets side by side split apart and drifted away from each other both going to the east coming from the west looked as if they were searching then 2 more army jets further apart one came from northwest other from south west both did the opposite to the 1st set of jets as they came closer together as they traveled east i started feeling very dizzy and a little sick no jet went north as i don't think any one could have saw it traveling north unless they were looking from outer space so i started going back inside my home when i felt like i was going to be sick i got inside an puked in the bathroom it is now close to 4am i i can't shake the feeling that im being monitored and i just seen something go by my window weird!!!!
content.shape: Circle,   Cylinder,   Diamond,   Disc,   Flash,   Saturn-like,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Triangle
content.summary: Ufo hovers then pulsates rotates  and is gone with a blink of an eye chased by army
